name: Penalties
text:
(a)  Any person against whom proceedings have been brought pursuant to section 321-379 which resulted in findings of any of the causes listed in subsection 321-379(b) may be assessed a fine of not less than $100 nor more than $5,000 for each offense.  Any action taken to impose or collect the penalty provided for in this subsection shall be considered a civil action.
	(b)  The director may bring a civil action to enjoin any person for violation of section 321-379(b). [L 1990, c 285, pt of §2]
